doc.title: 推荐1660ti 《F1 2019》官方PC系统配置要求公布
doc.text:
Codemasters日前通过Steam 产品页面发布了《F1 2019》官方PC系统配置要求。根据公布的信息，PC玩家至少需要配备英特尔i3 2130或AMD FX4300 和8GB内存，以及英伟达GeForce GTX640或AMD HD7750显卡。此外，游戏还需要80GB的空闲硬盘空间，支持微软最新的API, DirectX 12。《F1 2019》将于6月28日发行。以下是详细配置要求：
最低配置要求：
Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
OS: 64 bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
Processor: Intel i3 2130 / AMD FX4300
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GTX640 / HD7750
DirectX: Version 11
Network: Broadband Internet connection
Storage: 80 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
推荐配置要求：
Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
OS: 64 bit Version of Windows 10
Processor: Intel i5 9600k / AMD Ryzen 5 2600x
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660ti / RX590
DirectX: Version 12
Network: Broadband Internet connection
Storage: 80 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
